alert.note: Alert for Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:53PM CDT until April 26 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN RUSK COUNTY... At 452 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Overton to Turnertown, moving east at 30 mph. THESE ARE DESTRUCTIVE STORMS FOR PARTS OF RUSK COUNTY INCLUDING HENDERSON. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 440 PM CDT, golf ball sized hail was reported in Arp. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Kilgore, Overton, New London, Turnertown, Joinerville and Laird Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
